scripts.install:all: cd ./server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i --force
scripts.build-client: cd ./client && npm i --force && npm run build:web
scripts.build-server: cd ./server && npm i && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build-client && npm run build-server
scripts.build:raw: npm run build-client:raw && npm run build-server:raw
scripts.migrate:start:prod: npm run migrate && npm run start
